TopicTitle: The Official HypeTrain 0.90 Voyage Thread (Experimentals! Choo Choo Dangit!)

Articles.Content:
*Epic Darth Vader Voice*

My Ticket. Where is it.

HypeShuttle its time for you to become real!

HypeShuttle's first payload, will be the HypeTrain to get it into Orbit, so all further Hype Missions will be at Hype-levels above 9000.

HypeShuttle its time for you to become real!

HypeShuttle's first payload, will be the HypeTrain to get it into Orbit, so all further Hype Missions will be at Hype-levels above 9000.

Right on it!! hoping for non-scrubbed, clean launch!!

Right on it!! hoping for non-scrubbed, clean launch!!

But how can it be clean if we don't scrub off the dirt first?

HAHAHAHAHAHAhahahahahahahaaa... ha... haaa...

Oh my god. I'm so sorry.

That pun caused physical pain

But how can it be clean if we don't scrub off the dirt first?

HAHAHAHAHAHAhahahahahahahaaa... ha... haaa...

Oh my god. I'm so sorry.

That pun caused physical pain

I'll show you the door, shall I??
one ticket for the ever reliable Hype Train please
I hope this Hype Train had Deluxe Mk3 CargoBays... And snacks!

I hope this Hype Train had Deluxe Mk3 CargoBays... And snacks!

The HypeShuttle has beautiful Mk3 Cargobays.

And Cookies!! Lots of Cookies!!
I'd like a hype shuttle ticket.
chooooooooooooooooooo

So here's my release data speculation. Maxmaps said on Squadcast that we should look at the normal amount of time between experimentals and a release date:

Note that I'm not measuring the time between experimentals and the final patched release, but something else: the time between the announcement of experimentals and major release.

My source for the experimentals release dates was the official twitter account for KSP, the final release dates are from the KSP Wiki "Version history" article.

Unless there is a major problem in experimentals, I think this points to a release right before Christmas.
They also like to release on Tuesday, so my speculation would be the 16th or the 23rd, depending on if there are any set-backs.

I'd like a hype shuttle ticket.

Granted, sir.

I'd like a Shuttle ticket too please.

Besides: Is this a real SSTO Shuttle or just nasa-style-shuttle? I hope for real SSTO.

either way: to the bridge: engage the HYPErdrive!

I'd like a Shuttle ticket too please.

Besides: Is this a real SSTO Shuttle or just nasa-style-shuttle? I hope for real SSTO.

either way: to the bridge: engage the HYPErdrive!

Woot!!

BTW The HypeShuttle can be launched as an SSTO.
will there be coffee in coach?
I guess next Wednesday
They gun postpone it by a week so they can release in christmas

They gun postpone it by a week so they can release in christmas

I wouldn't mind that if they add GP2.

I'd like a hype shuttle ticket.

Hype shuttle is too hyped

I wouldn't mind that if they add GP2.

Every time I see GP2 now i have to think of "New planets are a big maybe atm"-Squad. Which drives me close to insane.

There are not enough planets yet, we don't need a lot more , just enough to fullfill the diversity: A GP2 with a Ring( and blue) , a Titan-like medium moon with thick atmo, a Triton-like reverse orbiting moon, a comet, a real Io-like volcaninc moon. These are things that stock is lacking right now completely and would really add to the diversity, it's like just 5 more celestial objects, and then we might be able to agree that more are for mods, but right now... there are still unfulfilled possibilities.

Just my two cents on the GP2 keyword.

Here's hope that they get added in the beta sometime, after all it's content and not new features, so still possible.
I place my guess on Tuesday or Wednesday.

I place my guess on Tuesday or Wednesday.

I place my guess on New Years. Chances are it'll come out a lot earlier and I'll get pleasantly surprised
I'm hoping Christmas

If we're at the phase where we're guessing, then I'll guess next Tuesday, as in 9 days from now. It's a full week before Christmas to put a patch out if they need one, and 2 weeks is a pretty common period of time for Experimentals to last.
